document_data.name: ''Littlefang''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Littlefang''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[short sword]] that fed on blood and restored the owner's vitality.
document_data.Description: ''Littlefang'' appeared to have a metallic sheen, but the heft of the blade was carved out of an unknown beast's tooth. The sword was sheathed in a metal hilt, and its blade had fine holes. When wielded in battle, the blade emitted visible dark energy and made its greedy bloodthirsty essence felt.
document_data.Powers: The blade's fine holes soaked up all blood that touched ''Littlefang''. The weapon used the consumed blood to heal its wielder, similarly to the effects of ''vampiric regeneration''. ''Littlefang'' itself was enhanced with a ''+2'' enchantment and had a chance of dealing devastating damage with a lucky strike.
